en.exportExplain: Copy this and save it somewhere.
en.importExplain: Paste the savedata here and click load.

popups.goneFor: You were gone for %1. You gained %2
popups.hardReset: Are you sure? All of your progress will be lost forever.
popups.kongError: Saves that started outside of Kongregate cannot be imported into the Kongregate Version
popups.uploadSuccess: Uploading to the cloud was successful!

e_flea.name: Flea
e_flea.desc: They are not really good in what they are doing but at least you can idle a bit. Power: 0.1

e_cockroach.name: Cockroach
e_cockroach.desc: Not very pleasant to have around in the office. Power: 1

e_hamster.name: Hamster
e_hamster.desc: At least they are cute. Power: 10

e_monkey.name: Monkey
e_monkey.desc: Having actual fingers helps a lot while working with computers. Power: 100

e_robot.name: Robot
e_robot.desc: Programmed to optimize everything to create the best games. Just be careful that they do not take over the world. Power: 10000

e_human.name: Human
e_human.desc: An actual human beeing, willing to sell their soul and work for you forever. Power: 1000

i_cent.name: Cent decoration
i_cent.desc: Hang the first cent you ever earned on the wall to get more Motivation and work 50% faster

serverSize.name: Server Size
serverSize.desc: How many games you can have published at the same time

bandWidth.name: Band Width
bandWidth.desc: How many players can play a game simultaneously

ideaProgressMulti.name: Thinking Speed
ideaProgressMulti.desc: Make % progress on a new idea per second

programmingXPMulti.name: Learn to Code
programmingXPMulti.desc: Multiplies logic skill learning speed by %

marketingXPMulti.name: Learn to Count
marketingXPMulti.desc: Multiplies charisma skill learning speed by %

ideaMulti.name: Bulk Thinking
ideaMulti.desc: Get % ideas when finishing an idea progress

greatIdeaChance.name: Great Ideas
greatIdeaChance.desc: % chance that an idea is a great idea

ideaReset.name: Holiday
ideaReset.desc: Refresh your thoughts. Will reset the cost of new ideas

uniqueIdeaChance.name: Unique Ideas
uniqueIdeaChance.desc: % chance that an idea is an unique idea

featuresProgressMulti.name: Programming Speed
featuresProgressMulti.desc: Make % progress on a new feature per second

contentStretching.name: Content Streching
contentStretching.desc: Keep a player busy with one feature for %

bugsQualityDecrease.name: Bug Hiding
bugsQualityDecrease.desc: Decreases the incluence a bug has on the game quality. Quality is % decreased per bug now

maxBugs.name: Careful Programming
maxBugs.desc: Produce less bugs per feature. Currently a feature will produce % bugs

qualityMulti.name: Programming Quality
qualityMulti.desc: Multiplies the quality of a game by %

bugsProgressMulti.name: Bug Fixing
bugsProgressMulti.desc: Make % progress on a bug per second

publicityProgressMulti.name: Marketing Speed
publicityProgressMulti.desc: Make % progress on publicity per second

publicityMulti.name: Marketing Effectiveness
publicityMulti.desc: A game will get % initial Players per publicity amount

cpmMulti.name: Money Grabbing
cpmMulti.desc: Get % money per 1000 players per day

donations.name: Donations
donations.desc: Your fans will donate % every day per 1000 fans

shopDiscount.name: Shop Discount
shopDiscount.desc: Items in the shop cost % of their original price

de.exportExplain: Kopiere diesen Text und speichere ihn irgendwo.
de.importExplain: Füge die Spielstanddaten hier ein und bestätige.

popups.hardReset: Bist du sicher? Dein Spielstand wird unwiderruflich gelöscht.
popups.kongError: Es können nur Spielstände importiert werden, die auf Kongregate gestartet wurden.
